question: The ________ can be turned off by the CPU before the execution of critical instruction sequences that must not be interrupted
options: ['a) nonmaskable interrupt', 'b) blocked interrupt', 'c) maskable interrupt', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: The __________ is used by device controllers to request service
options: ['a) nonmaskable interrupt', 'b) blocked interrupt', 'c) maskable interrupt', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: The interrupt vector contains ____________
options: ['a) the interrupts', 'b) the memory addresses of specialized interrupt handlers', 'c) the identifiers of interrupts', 'd) the device addresses']
option2: b) the memory addresses of specialized interrupt handlers

question: Division by zero, accessing a protected or non existent memory address, or attempting to execute a privileged instruction from user mode are all categorized as ________
options: ['a) errors', 'b) exceptions', 'c) interrupt handlers', 'd) all of the mentioned']

question: For large data transfers, _________ is used
options: ['a) dma', 'b) programmed I/O', 'c) controller register', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: A character stream device transfers ____________
options: ['a) bytes one by one', 'b) block of bytes as a unit', 'c) with unpredictable response times', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option2: b) block of bytes as a unit

question: A block device transfers ____________
options: ['a) bytes one by one', 'b) block of bytes as a unit', 'c) with unpredictable response times', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option2: b) block of bytes as a unit

question: What is a dedicated device?
options: ['a) opposite to a sharable device', 'b) same as a sharable device', 'c) can be used concurrently by several processes', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) opposite to a sharable device
option2: b) same as a sharable device
option3: c) can be used concurrently by several processes

question: A keyboard is an example of a device that is accessed through a __________ interface
options: ['a) block stream', 'b) set of blocks', 'c) character stream', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: In polling ____________
options: ['a) busy – wait cycles wait for I/O from device', 'b) interrupt handler receives interrupts', 'c) interrupt-request line is triggered by I/O device', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) busy – wait cycles wait for I/O from device
option3: c) interrupt-request line is triggered by I/O device

question: A non blocking system call _________________
options: ['a) halts the execution of the application for an extended time', 'b) does not halt the execution of the application', 'c) does not block the interrupts', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) halts the execution of the application for an extended time
option2: b) does not halt the execution of the application
option3: c) does not block the interrupts

question: An asynchronous call ____________
options: ['a) returns immediately, without waiting for the I/O to complete', 'b) does not return immediately and waits for the I/O to complete', 'c) consumes a lot of time', 'd) is too slow']
option1: a) returns immediately, without waiting for the I/O to complete
option2: b) does not return immediately and waits for the I/O to complete
option3: c) consumes a lot of time
